system.summary: Refine an existing work of art that falls within your specialization.

description.value:
As a Long Rest Action, you can refine one piece of art that you could reasonably create with your specialization. You can refine a piece of art over the course of multiple rests, but an art piece can only be refined up to 5 times total. Each refinement costs an additional 5gp worth of art supplies. Each time you attempt to refine a piece of art, reduce the quality level by 10, and then make an Intelligence (Craft) check and add it to the @Compendium[undertaking.tables.SVAINSJV86RZ4629]{Art Quality} level. Based on the resulting quality level, the price of the art further increases.

  • Fine Art: Art over a certain quality level is considered Fine Art. A creature of intelligence 6 or higher may gain a one-time benefit upon spending 1 minute observing the piece for the first time. Receiving the effect from a Fine Art piece gives you the option to take the effect of a lower quality piece as well. A creature cannot receive the bonus from more than one Fine Art piece at once.
  • You can attempt to refine an art piece with less than 5gp worth of supplies for a -1 to your Intelligence (Craft) checks, and a further -1 for each 5sp less than 5gp. For example, using supplies worth a bit more than 2gp will confer a -6 on your Intelligence (Craft) check.
